DOC.brief_summary: In this functional magnetic resonance imaging study, effects of different information of fat content of high or low fat will be examined in FD patients and healthy volunteers (n=30, respectively). These data will provide a better understanding of symptom generation following food ingestion in general as well as in patients with respective functional gastrointestinal disorders.
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Modulation of Dyspeptic Symptom During Food Ingestion in Functional Dyspepsia Patients Cognitive Modulation
